rules_text:
Twisted Guardian gets +7/+7 and has trample as long as you control eight or more lands.
When Twisted Guardian dies, search your library for a basic land card, reveal it, put it into your hand, then shuffle.
flavor_text:
[i]“Hmph, reanimated roots. Does this world have no limits on what it might pervert?”
— Undue, undead traveler[/i]
